content.question: Atque hic Aeneas (una namque ire videbat egregium forma iuvenem et fulgentibus armis, sed frons laeta parum et deiecto lumina vultu) "Quis, pater, ille virum qui sic comitatur euntem? Filius, anne aliquis magna de stirpe nepotum? (5) Qui strepitus circa comitum! Quantum instar in ipso! Sed nox atra caput tristi circumvolat umbra." 1. In one or two sentences, identify the historical person from the Augustan period referred to in the passage above and describe his fate.

2. (a) Translate the words egregium forma iuvenem et fulgentibus armis (line 2) as literally as possible. (b) These words (egregium . . . armis) can be applied to a number of other characters whose fate is depicted in Books 7-12. Identify one of these characters and, in two or three sentences, describe what happens to this character in Vergil's narrative.
